name: Defender of Earth (gameslee)
description:
You are Earth's last defense from the onslaught of alien invaders attempting to take control of the planet's resources! Shoot enemy ships, collect powerups, and avoid enemy attacks in order to defeat the alien mothership and save Earth!

Some Background

When I first started creating games, I was inspired by the fast paced flash game 'Raiden X,' and decided to make a very similar game to it as practice of sorts. This game, 'Defender of Earth,' is a remastered version of that first game, with nicer visuals, added audio, and more content.  I hope you enjoy playing this game as much as I enjoyed making it!

Instructions

Arrow Keys to move

Z to fire, X to use Bomb

M/S to toggle Music/Sound

P to pause
